ygData.subject: RE: Dark Forge Bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: I posted both. Both items were received by friends. The BP stats and what it looks like were sent thru a /tell to us right after he got it. The Bracer i have
ygData.messageBody:
I posted both.
Both items were received by friends. The BP stats and
what it looks like were sent thru a /tell to us right
after he got it.
The Bracer i have seen on a friend personally.

And who ever said it was all going to be the same
color?

If you see differently then post your own SS.
Unfortunately the friend with the BP destroyed it
since he already has Umbral before i could get a SS
from him.


--- Krukhan Garabash <krukhan@...> wrote:
> ack....red.
>
> makes you wonder about whoever it was who posted
> that 18 ac, +10 sta, black
> color stuff about the bp (on one of the forums, with
> no ss mind you, was
> reposted here too)...hmmmmmm.
>
> i for one hope you are lying and/or colorblind =)
>
> rubi is hideous.
>
> -kg
>
>
> >From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu
> <countess_bathory_69@...>
> >Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> >To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> >Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Dark Forge Bracer
> >Date: Mon, 18 Oct 1999 13:38:51 -0700 (PDT)
> >
> >The bracer is NO DROP but not LORE. you can
> eventually
> >get 2.
> >And yes it is red.
> >
> >--- "Wilson, ThomasX B"
> <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
> >wrote:
> > > Ok so lets get this straight, you have to do
> this
> > > quest twice to get both
> > > bracers.... Hmm.. Gee like once isn't enough...
> > >
> > > I'm assuming that when you say it looks like
> rubi
> > > you mean it has that god
> > > awful red color (I had rubi pants for about 3
> > > minutes, couldn't stand how
> > > they looked though, S. Plated are much nicer
> > > looking)..
> > >
> > > You know I keep expecting to hear good news out
> of
> > > these quest, but as of
> > > yet it hasn't happened (Good stats on bracer
> overall
> > > though, with both it
> > > would be a nice dex boost).
> > >
> > > Oh is it No Drop?
> > >
> > > Enjoy
> > >
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu
> > > [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 12:35 PM
> > > To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [shadowknight] Dark Forge Bracer
> > >
> > >
> > > From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu
> > > <countess_bathory_69@...>
> > >
> > > We completed the bracer quest last night.
> > >
> > > 8AC
> > > 3 DEX
> > > Looks like rubi
> > >
> > > Heres the fun part.
> > >
> > > Both the Decaying Right and Decaying Left bracer
> > > along
> > > with the Mino Shackles are needed.
> > > Do you think that you'll be getting 2 bracers
> back
> > > though?
> > >
> > > Bwahaha...that would make sense
> > >
> > > Nope... left + right + shackles = 1 bracer
> > >
> > > Up side is you get some nice XP for doing it
> > >
> > > I should have a SS before the end on the day
> > >
> > > Bathory D'Allatu
